params.title: Search for an Account
params.initialQuery: select Name, OwnerId, BillingPostalCode  from Account order by LastModifiedDate desc limit 10

params.title: Search for a Contact
params.initialQuery: select Name from Contact order by LastModifiedDate desc limit 10

params.title: Search for a Case
params.initialQuery: select CaseNumber, ContactId, ContactEmail from Case order by LastModifiedDate desc limit 10
